ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced specialized limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor, to be further upgraded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced compact weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the compact, concealable bionic weapons which can be embedded in various body parts, to be further upgraded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organ integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows integrating the implants with molecular analyzers for assisting the immune system into synthetic organs.
